      • initGame

        public void initGame(int mazeSize,
            int mode,
            int nDragons,
            int builder)
        Initializes the game according to the selected settings in the interface.
        Parameters:
        mazeSize - the option selected (standard = 0 or random maze = size of maze)
        mode - the mode of the dragon
        nDragons - the n dragons
        builder - the builder
